typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_agreement_type',
	format: 'query',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_agreement_type.parquet']) ~> preDimAgreementType
preDimAgreementType derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Agreement Types') ~> derivedTopLevel
derivedTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(agt_key))) ~> alterRow
alterRow sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		top_description as string,
		top_key as string,
		top_id as long,
		agt_key as string,
		agt_id as long,
		agt_description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		each(match(/* All input columns */ true()),
			/* Input name */ $$ = $$)
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimAgreementTypeInsert
